name: Knife Battle.
description:
Now, do not play alone, but add fun and tension by competing with other users.
You can enjoy the game anytime and anywhere with easy and fast competition.

Features of Knife Battle
- You can enjoy the competition of throwing a knife with people all over the world.
- There are various patterns of channels suitable for the user, which adds fun to the game.
- Quick matching system
- Collect prizes and compete with users around the world.

Game rules
- Throw knives in the space without hitting any knives within the time limit.
- If you win 2 rounds out of 3 rounds, you win the game.

Tip
Find the speed of the knife suitable for you.
